Sentencas: Flame-assisted vapor deposition (FAVD) has a principle similar to conventional CVD in which a film is deposited from a vapor phase.
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: It is a simple and cost-effective technique as it is operated in an open atmosphere.
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: The microstructure of the deposited films is controlled by varying the processing parameters.
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: In our research, an oxide film of lanthanum chromite perovskite-based (La0.8Sr0.2CrO3) material is fabricated, using the FAVD technique, on a stainless steel substrate (SS430) for an application in solid oxide fuel cells (SOFC).
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: The precursor solution for La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 film is prepared from metal nitrate compounds with a concentration in the range 0.0125-0.0500 M. Dense and porous films are fabricated, depending on various processing parameters such as fuel to water ratio, air pressure, flow rate of a precursor, and the distance between the spray nozzle and the substrate.
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: The effect of various processing parameters on the microstructure and phase formation of the deposited film are investigated using scanning electron microscopy (SEM) and X-ray diffraction (XRD).
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: The deposition temperature resulting from the total heat of combustion from the combination of all the deposition parameters is very important in determining the properties of the films.
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: According to the SEM images, a small particle size on the nanometer scale is found at high deposition temperature.
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: On the other hand, the particles are connected into a dense film at low deposition temperatures.
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: The main phase of LaCrO3 is found in all deposition temperatures (temp range).
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: For hydrogen production, the methane steam reforming over the porous film of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3 at 900 degrees C is investigated.
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming

Sentencas: Under specific operating conditions (low inlet H2O/CH4 ratio), its catalytic reactivity is comparable to metallic-based catalysts but with less inlet steam required.
Titulo: Fabrication of La0.8Sr0.2CrO3-based Perovskite Film via Flame-Assisted Vapor Deposition for H2 Production by Reforming
